content:
【合作内容】

**一、OwnBank与合作方的分工**

1. OwnBank提供以下业务功能
| 业务功能            | 选择   |
|-----------------|------|
| Opening Account | 可选   |
| Cash In         | 必选   |
| Transfer        | 必选   |
| Send Cash       | 必选   |
| Cash Out        | 必选   |
| Time Deposit    | 可选   |
| Pots（灵活存取）      | 可选   |
| 生活服务            | 必选   |
| 账单缴费            | 必选   |
| 扫码支付            | 必选   |
| 收款码/商户码         | 可选   |
| 贷款              | 可选   |
| OwnBanker(代理)   | 必选   |
| 优惠券系统           | 必选   |
| 发卡（即将上线）        | 可选   |

*后续OwnBank开发的新业务无特殊说明均为必选功能，自动向合作方用户开放

1. 合作方需在OwnBank开立对公账户，用于存款、贷款、手续费等的结算，后续简称为合作方账户
2. 合作方向OwnBank提供存款产品和贷款产品的相关参数（利率、期限、产品名称、产品类别等），OwnBank负责配置上线
3. 贷款产品OwnBank提供风控审核后台，合作方负责审核并决定是否放贷
4. 关于ADB的要求

合作方不选择 Opening Account 功能

1）合作方账户需保持在存资金（包括合作方的Pots、Time Deposit）的10%作为ADB，最低ADB不小于20万比索

合作方选择 Opening Account 功能

1）用户在合作方银行账户的余额由合作方负责支配

2）合作方账户需保持在存资金（包括用户在合作方银行账户的余额、Pots、Time Deposit）的15%作为ADB，最低ADB不小于30万比索

合作方日终ADB不满足要求时，每日收取ADB的0.1%作为罚款，所有合作方的用户交易均暂停

**二、服务费、分润及用户手续费**

**部分可选功能费用列表如下：**

| 业务功能         | OwnBank服务费   | 用户手续费   | 合作方分润费   |
|--------------|--------------|---------|----------|
| Time Deposit | 0.6%p.a.     | -       | -        |
| Pot（灵活存取）    | 0.3%p.a.     | -       | -        |
| 贷款           | 3% p.a.      | -       | -        |

**合作方选择 Opening Account 功能，其他功能费用列表如下**

*合作方不选择 Opening Account 功能，OwnBank不收取下表功能费用

| 业务功能            | OwnBank服务费   | 用户手续费          | 合作方分润费    |
|-----------------|--------------|----------------|-----------|
| Opening Account | 0.3%p.a.     | -              | -         |
| Cash In         | PHP 20/TRX   | PHP 20/TRX     | -         |
| Transfer        | PHP 5/TRX    | PHP 10/TRX     | -         |
| Send Cash       |              |                | -         |
| Cash Out        |              |                | -         |
| Load&Games      | -            | -              | 0.5%-2.5% |
| Pay Bills       | -            | 极少数Biller向用户收费 | PHP 2/TRX |
| 扫码支付            | -            | -              | -         |
| 收款码/商户码         | PHP 3/TRX    | PHP 0/TRX      | -         |
| OwnBanker(代理)   | 暂时免费         | -              | -         |
| 优惠券系统           | 券面值          | -              | -         |
| 发卡（即将上线）        | -            | -              | -         |

**三、资金结算**

**（1）双方同意采用实时结算模式，即用户发生交易后，OwnBank与合作方账户实时结算**

**（2）存款产品结算**

未选择Opening Account：用户购买存款产品后，OwnBank需将相应资金结算至合作方账户

选择Opening Account：用户购买存款产品后，资金不发生结算

**（3）贷款产品结算**

未选择Opening Account：用户借款获得审批后，OwnBank将实时从合作方账户扣款并放款至用户OwnBank账户

选择Opening Account：用户借款获得审批后，资金不发生结算

**（4）合作方用户账户资金变动**

**选择Opening Account：**

a)当用户account收到资金时（充值、收到转账），OwnBank需将相应资金结算至合作方账户

b)当用户account提取资金时（转账、寄钱、取现、支付），OwnBank将实时从合作方账户扣款

**未选择Opening Account：** 用户账户资金发生变动时，资金不发生结算

**（5）用户交易的手续费、OwnBank服务费及合作方分润费结算**

贷款OwnBank服务费，每笔借款获得审批后，OwnBank将实时从合作方账户扣除

**未选择Opening Account** ：

a)无手续费结算

b)无合作方分润费结算

c)每日日终OwnBank将从合作方账户扣除当日在存资金（包括合作方的Pots、Time Deposit）分成

**选择Opening Account：-**

a)用户的每笔交易产生的费用（用户手续费 - OwnBank服务费）将结算至合作方账户

b)用户的每笔交易产生的分润费用将实时结算至合作方账户

c)每日日终OwnBank将从合作方账户扣除当日在存资金（包括用户在合作方银行账户的余额、Pots、Time Deposit）分成

**四、安全相关**

<!-- image -->

**1.Cloud platform security includes physical security, hardware security, and the cloud product layers, all these bottom layers security protect is provided by our cloud platform supplier alibaba**

**2.VM security, Container security, network security protect is provided by our SRE team, they have made some mechanisms and tools to help them to let these layers security work well and stable**

**3 User infrastructure security protect is provided by our  base technology team,  they have developed some devops system to service our top layers**

**4.User Business security, User Application security, user data security protect is provided by product and business develop team,  all these teams provide different features to service our custom**

**五 系统架构**

**1 frontground technology**

**1.1 cross-end**

**We will try to use cross-end technical solutions, such as Flutter, ReactNative and Mini Program.**

**Through the application of these technologies, we will reduce the labor cost of iOS and Android, and**

**use a cross-end technical talent to meet the research and development requirements of the two**

**platforms.Technical Skills, Flutter, React, ReactNative, WXML.**

<!-- image -->

**1.2 low code platform**

**The low-code platform technology can greatly reduce the R&D cost of our operation activities which**

**allow the operation to quickly configure the operation activities.**

**Secondly, in the management system that can support the internal platform, R&D personnel can**

**quickly configure an internal management configuration interface, thereby effectively reducing the**

**dependence on front-end R&D resources. Technical Skills, Low-code implementation, we will do some research on these technologies in the future, such as React, Mobx, Rust & WASM, DSL.**

<!-- image -->

**2.background technology**

**2.1  micro-service architecture technology base layer**

<!-- image -->

**All background service is build on our micro-service technology base platform, which consist of micro-service framework 、distributed msg que system,  distributed job scheduler ,database component memcache component and so on. With the help of  some manage system and devops relation system,   all system built on this base technology platform can increase their process capacity anytime as needed，with the increase of ownbank business**

**2.2 monitor and alert**

**After the business requirement is implemented and deployed to the product environment, we need a**

**set of monitor and alert systems to help us check the running status of all service/server.**

**● single node monitor system with help of single node monitor system , we can collect all**

**running status data including os layer, base component layer, service framework and business**

**server layer**

<!-- image -->

**● call chain monitor system, As the business becomes prosperous, the micro services of**

**business become more and more , the difficulty of system maintenance also rises quickly. at**

**this time ,we need a call chain monitor system to help us**

**【Cooperation Content】**

1. **Division of Labor between OwnBank and the Partner**

1. OwnBank provides the following business functions:

| **Business Function**        | **Selection**   |
|------------------------------|-----------------|
| Opening Account              | Optional        |
| Cash In                      | Required        |
| Transfer                     | Required        |
| Send Cash                    | Required        |
| Cash Out                     | Required        |
| Time Deposit                 | Optional        |
| Pots (Flexible Savings)      | Optional        |
| Lifestyle Services           | Required        |
| Bill Payment                 | Required        |
| Scan-to-Pay                  | Required        |
| Receipt Code / Merchant Code | Optional        |
| Loans                        | Optional        |
| OwnBanker (Agent)            | Required        |
| Coupon System                | Required        |
| Card Issuance (Coming soon)  | Optional        |

*Tips：

1）All new business functions developed by OwnBank in the future, unless otherwise specified, will be required functions automatically made available to the partner's users.

2）When the "Opening Account" feature is not selected, the users referred by the partner will still open accounts with OwnBank. However, when the "Opening Account" feature is selected, the accounts opened by the users referred by the partner will be associated with the partner bank.

1. Corporate account：The partner is required to open a corporate account with OwnBank for the settlement of deposits, loans, transaction fees, etc., hereinafter referred to as the "partner account."

1. Product configuration：The partner is responsible for providing OwnBank with relevant parameters (interest rates, terms, product names, product categories, etc.) for deposit and loan products. OwnBank is responsible for configuring and launching these products.

1. Loan approval：OwnBank provides a risk control review backend for loan products, and the partner is responsible for reviewing and deciding whether to approve the loan applications.

1. Regarding ADB requirements：

If the partner does not select the "Opening Account" function:

1）The partner account must maintain an Average Daily Balance (ADB) of 10% of the funds deposited (including the partner's Pots and Time Deposits), with a minimum ADB of 200,000 pesos.

If the partner selects the "Opening Account" function:

1）The partner is responsible for managing the balances in the users' bank accounts held with the partner.

2）The partner account must maintain an ADB of 15% of the funds deposited (including the balances in the users' bank accounts, Pots, and Time Deposits), with a minimum ADB of 300,000 pesos. If the ADB requirement is not met by the end of the day, a penalty of 0.1% of the ADB will be charged daily, and all transactions for the partner's users will be temporarily suspended.

1. Voucher system：OwnBank provides a voucher system for partner banks to use. Partners can use this system to subsidize user fees on the customer side.

1. Integration partners：OwnBank has integrated with Instapay and Pesnoet, and accepts transfers completely free of charge.

1. Customer Support: The platform will provide a Help Center & FAQ where users can find answers to platform-related questions provided by OwnBank. If there are inquiries related to partner bank products, contact information will be provided for partner users to seek assistance.

1. Technical Integration: If the partner bank has the technical capability, we can provide API interfaces free of charge to facilitate data migration. Subsequently, all user transaction activities on OwnBank will be synchronized with the partner bank's system.

**2. Service Fees, Revenue Sharing, and User Fees**

The list below shows the fees for some optional functions:

| Business Function       | OwnBank Service Fee   | User Fee   | Partner Revenue Sharing Fee   |
|-------------------------|-----------------------|------------|-------------------------------|
| Time Deposit            | 0.6% p.a.             | -          | -                             |
| Pots (Flexible Savings) | 0.3% p.a.             | -          | -                             |
| Loans                   | 3% p.a.               | -          | -                             |

If the partner selects the "Opening Account" function, the fee list for other functions is as follows:

If the partner does not select the "Opening Account" function, OwnBank does not charge fees for the functions listed below:

| Business Function            | OwnBank Service Fee   | User Fee                 | Partner Revenue Sharing Fee   |
|------------------------------|-----------------------|--------------------------|-------------------------------|
| Opening Account              | 0.3% p.a.             | -                        | -                             |
| Cash In -Online Banking）     | PHP 20/TRX            | PHP 20/TRX               | -                             |
| Cash In -Cash Only           | PHP 20/TRX            | PHP 20/TRX               |                               |
| Cash In -QR PH (Coming soon) | PHP 3/TRX             | PHP 0/TRX                |                               |
| Transfer                     | PHP 5/TRX             | PHP 10/TRX               | -                             |
| Send Cash                    | -                     | -                        | -                             |
| Cash Out                     | -                     | -                        | -                             |
| Load & Games                 | -                     | -                        | 0.5%-2.5%                     |
| Pay Bills                    | -                     | Few Billers charge users | PHP 2/TRX                     |
| Scan-to-Pay                  | -                     | -                        | -                             |
| Receipt Code / Merchant Code | PHP 3/TRX             | PHP 0/TRX                | -                             |
| OwnBanker (Agent)            | Temporarily Free      | -                        | -                             |
| Coupon System                | Face Value            | -                        | -                             |
| Card Issuance (Coming soon)  | -                     | -                        | -                             |

1. **Fund Settlement**

1. Both parties agree to adopt real-time settlement mode, where after a user makes a transaction, OwnBank and the partner's account settle the funds in real-time.

1. Settlement of Deposit Products

1）If Opening Account is not selected: After a user purchases a deposit product, OwnBank must settle the corresponding funds to the partner's account.

2）If Opening Account is selected: After a user purchases a deposit product, no fund settlement occurs.

1. Settlement of Loan Products

1）If Opening Account is not selected: After a user's loan is approved, OwnBank deducts the funds from the partner's account in real-time and disburses them to the user's OwnBank account.

2）If Opening Account is selected: After a user's loan is approved, no fund settlement occurs.

4.Fund Changes in the Partner's User Accounts

1）If Opening Account is selected:

a) When the user's account receives funds (cash In, received transfer), OwnBank must settle the corresponding funds to the partner's account.

b) When the user's account withdraws funds (transfer, send cash, cash out, payment), OwnBank deducts the funds from the partner's account in real-time.

2）If Opening Account is not selected:

When there are fund changes in the user's account, no fund settlement occurs.

5.Settlement of User Transaction Fees, OwnBank Service Fees, and Partner Revenue Sharing Fees For loan products, after each loan is approved, OwnBank deducts the loan's service fee in real-time from the partner's account.

1）If Opening Account is not selected:

a) No transaction fee settlement occurs.

b) No partner revenue sharing fee settlement occurs.

c) At the end of each day, OwnBank deducts a portion from the funds deposited that day (including the partner's Pots and Time Deposits).

2）If Opening Account is selected:

a) The fees generated from each user's transaction (user fee - OwnBank service fee) are settled to the partner's account.

b) The revenue sharing fees generated from each user's transaction are settled in real-time to the partner's account.

c) At the end of each day, OwnBank deducts a portion from the funds deposited that day (including the balances in the user's bank account held with the partner, Pots, and Time Deposits).

1. **Risk & Security**

There are several scenarios where we will do anti-fraud strategy and security enhancement.

**4.1.1 Risk control & Anti-Fraud**

**Scenarios:Open an account**

If a customer registers an account in the ownbank system, the account opening will require the customer to complete KYC authentication. The system has a component with face recognition function, and will determine whether the current registered account is software registration or personal registration. If the account is not opened by myself, the registration will be rejected.

<!-- image -->

Security components provide the ability to block illegal users by rules based on rule engine and models based on machine learning and artificial intelligence althgithom.The key components are listed below:

●  	Liveness detection

●  	Slider detection

●  	OTP One Time Password

After ownbank deploys the security components of the risk control system, it has security capabilities such as real person verification, can detect abnormal user behavior, whether the device operating environment is normal, and prevent brushing, and intercept customer behavior according to different security policies.

The ownbank system can access the security verification component to protect our customers and verify whether they operate by themselves. The security verification component has different levels such as graphic verification code, SMS verification code, last four digits of ID card, face authentication, password, and security question and answer. verification function. The security verification component changes according to the policies triggered by customers in different scenarios.

<!-- image -->

#### Scenarios:Transfer

Transfer includes inner-bank transfer and inter-bank transfer. The risk in this scenario is the risk of loss of funds, and the strategies for risk control involved in this scenario are as follows:

●      The user's PIN must be verified when submitting a transfer request. If the PIN is incorrect on multiple attempts, the PIN will be locked for 24 hours and cannot be retried.

●       Face verification required for PIN change

#### Scenarios:Withdraw

Cash withdrawal includes offline cash withdrawal and remittance, the risk in this scenario is the risk of loss of funds, strategies for risk control involved in this scenario are as follows:

●     To submit a cash withdrawal application, the user's PIN must be verified. If the PIN is incorrect in multiple attempts, the PIN will be locked for 24 hours and cannot be retried.

●  Face verification required for PIN change

●   Withdrawal information such as recipient's name, mobile number etc. will be displayed as ***

We are now also working on more scenarios based anti-fraud strategy which can protect our users on ownbank APP.The key strategies which we are now working on and will continue work on are listed below:

<!-- image -->

#### 4.1.2  Security services for cyber attacks

Security services also provide the ability to prevent cyber attacks.Risks and mitigation strategies are listed below:

●  	Phishing

○      Ownbank's mailbox will detect phishing emails, find and block malicious files and phishing website links in emails.

○      The employee computers of ownbank will be installed with antivirus software. If the employee's computer is attacked by phishing, malware or malicious links are opened, the background of the anti-virus software can see the blocking situation.

○     The ownbank information security team regularly conducts information security training and education for employees, telling employees not to click on unknown emails and execute documents from unknown sources. Ownbank's information security team regularly conducts internal blue army drills, imitating cybercriminals to send phishing emails or Trojan horse viruses to employees, to test the security protection capability of phishing attacks, and to check employees' information security awareness.

●  Remote work

○      Laptops of ownbank employees need to install data leakage prevention software to access the VPN to access the internal system. The data leakage prevention software will block users' sensitive data from being sent out through the Internet, prohibit data copying to mobile hard disks, and employees' office computers will require access to the domain controller , the computer password is forced to be changed regularly.

○      Ownbank has deployed data leakage prevention software forcepoint dlp, which can monitor and intercept sensitive data leakage behaviors on employees' computers, such as copying ownbank's sensitive data to a mobile hard drive, or sending sensitive data through whatsapp.

○      When employees work from home, their VPN account login status will be monitored. If the account logs in from different places, does not log in through a device, or fails to log in too many times, a security alarm will be triggered to determine that the employee account or computer is being used by criminals. In addition, data leakage prevention tools block them from copying ownbank's sensitive data.

●  Malware and ransomware

○      Anti-virus software can block software containing virus Trojans and rogue software. If there is a CVE of major loopholes, employees will be required to install system patches.

○      In addition to requiring employees to install AsiaInfo anti-virus software to prevent ransomware attacks, it also regularly conducts information security awareness training for employees, reminding employees to update security patches regularly, not to open malicious software of unknown sources at will, formulate emergency plans and regular security drills. In the event of a cyber attack, the information security team can be contacted in time.

●  Spoofing

○      The information security team of ownbank will regularly scan the Internet for high imitation domain names to check whether the high imitation domain name is a phishing website. If it is a phishing website, the information security team will complain to the domain name provider for the illegal website.

○      If the account of an employee or customer is stolen, the ownbank system will also access the security verification component to check whether the device logged in with the account is a commonly used device. If it is not a commonly used device, different security components, such as face recognition, SMS verification code, etc will be triggered.

○      After the security verification component of the risk control system is used to protect our customer account from being stolen, key operations such as password modification, mobile phone number modification, and transfer cannot be performed to ensure the security of customer accounts and funds.

○      Prompt employees or customers not to visit phishing websites and enter sensitive information such as personal account passwords and ID numbers through security awareness education. And when sending SMS verification codes to employees or customers, the SMS content adds a prompt "Don't give the verification code to others easily."

We are working on more security standards and systems building in the next few years,including:

●  	ISO 27001 security system establishment and certification

●  	Deployment and use of SIEM

●  	Background deployment and use of risk control case management

●  	Data encryption and transformation

●  	Pentest security test

### 4.2  Effectiveness Platform

Use technology to optimize R&D efficiency, improve R&D quality, and reduce R&D resources investment. In order to achieve this goal, we need to make technical attempts from the following aspects.

#### 4.2.1   Cross-end

We will try to use cross-end technical solutions, such as Flutter, ReactNative and Mini Program.

Through the application of these technologies, we will reduce the labor cost of iOS and Android, and use a cross-end technical talent to meet the research and development requirements of the two platforms.

<!-- image -->

Technical Skills, Flutter, React, ReactNative, WXML.

#### 4.2.2  LowCode Platform

The low-code platform technology can greatly reduce the R&D cost of our operation activities which allow the operation to quickly configure the operation activities.

Secondly, in the management system that can support the internal platform, R&D personnel can quickly configure an internal management configuration interface, thereby effectively reducing the dependence on front-end R&D resources.

<!-- image -->

Technical Skills, Low-code implementation, we will do some research on these technologies in the future, such as **React, Mobx, Rust & WASM, DSL.**

#### 4.2.3  Automated test platform

In order to reduce test resources, the core process can be quickly verified to ensure the online security of the core process.

This part of the technology includes:

●  	Automated UI testing

●  	Automated data reporting test

●  	Automated testing of background interfaces

●  	Automated dial testing of background interfaces

●  	Automated stress testing of background interfaces Technical Skills, **Python, Pytest, Request,** Appium, Jmeter.

### 4.3  Micro Service

**4.3.1  design and implement the Micro Services Architecture technology base**

<!-- image -->

1.     Container is responsible for launching, loading, and running the service Provider.

2.     Provider registers its services to Register at the time it starts.

3.     Consumer subscribes the services it needs from the Register when it starts.

4.     Register returns the Providers list to Consumer, when it changes, the Register will push the changed data to Consumer through long connection.

5.     Consumer selects one of the Providers based on soft load balancing algorithm and executes the invocation, if fails, it will choose another Provider.

the key features of micro service framework includes but not limited to

1.     the core features of micro service framework include Robustness:

●  	When the DB server goes down, Register can return service Providers list to Consumer by checking its cache, but new Provider cannot register any services

●      Register is a peer cluster, it will automatically switch to another when any instance goes down

●      Even all Register’s instances go down, Provider and Consumer can still communicate by checking their local cache

●      Register is aware of the existence of Provider through the long connection, when Provider gets down, Register will push the event to Consumer

●  	Service Providers are stateless, one instance’s downtime doesn’t affect the usage

●      After all the Providers of one service go down, Consumer can not use that service, and infinitely reconnect to wait for service Provider to recover

Scalability:

●      Register is a peer cluster that can dynamically increase its instances, all clients will automatically discover the new instances.

●      Provider is stateless, it can dynamically increase the deployment instances, and the registry will push the new service provider information to the Consumer.

2.     offers a number of balancing strategies for cluster load balancing, including

●  	random strategy:set random probabilities by weight

●  	round robin strategy: use the weight’s common advisor to determine round robin ratio

●      leastactive strategy: a random mechanism based on actives, actives means the number of requests a consumer have sent but not return yet

●  	consistentHash strategy: the same parameters of the request is always sent to the same provider

3.     offers a variety of fault-tolerant scenarios when a cluster call fails, including

●      failover:failure automatically switches, when there is failure, retry the other server (default). Usually used for read operations, but retries can result in longer delays

●      failfast:Fast failure, only made a call, failure immediately error. Usually used for non-idempotent write operations, such as adding records

●  	failsafe:Failure of security, anomalies, directly ignored. Usually used to write audit logs and other operations.

●      failback:Failure automatically restored, failed to record the background request, regular retransmission. Usually used for message notification operations.

●      Broadcast:Calling all providers broadcast, one by one call, any error is reported . It is usually used to notify all providers to update local resource information such as caches or logs.

4.     delay publish, if your services need time to warm up, such as: initialization cache or another reference resource has to be ready. You can use the delay feature to delay publishing services. We fine-tuned the service delay exposure logic, delaying the countdown of services that require delayed exposure until Spring initialization is complete.

5.     you can temporarily shield a non-critical service through the service downgrade and define the return policy for it.

6.     graceful shutdown service without losing data Service provider

●  	When stopped, first marked as not receiving new requests, the new request directly returns the error, so that the client retries other machines.

●      Then check if the thread pool thread is running, if any, waiting for all threads to complete execution, unless overtime, then forced to close.

Service consumer

●  	When stopped, No longer initiates a new request, all requests on the client that got an error.

●  	Then check if the request has not returned the response, waiting for the response to return, unless overtime, then forced to close.

### 4.4  devops

#### 4.4.1  Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment

In order to efficiently fulfill the business requirements, we need a set of tools and workflow specifications to support organizations to coordinate with each other better. all roles including productor、developer、are、oa kown their position in the entire flow, also known what to do to help other role’s work can be done without block

4.5  Data Platform

#### 4.5.1  Data Security & Data access Management

**Auditing and Sensitive Data Encryption**

Review and control of database operation and maintenance behaviors through the operation and maintenance management system, and the sensitive data is deformed, encrypted, or converted into fictitious data;

Through the audit system, the operation behavior of the database is monitored to provide accurate traceability for the post-determination of responsibility for the safety of everything.

**Access Management**

The RBAC model will control the permissions of users by defining the permissions of roles and granting certain roles to users, thus realizing the logical separation of users and permissions. It simplifies the relationship between users and permissions, and is easy to expand and maintain. Divide the roles of accessing data into:

●  	Administrator

●  	Editor (read/write)

●  	Visitor (read only for specific datas of his/her roles)

Then assign different Permissions based on different Roles. All permission applications and authorization processes will be strictly recorded.

**Least privilege & Privilege expiration**

All data permissions are granted in accordance with the principle of least permission, and the permission expiration time will be set to strictly control the granularity of data access.

The above functions are implemented by the data rights management system.

#### 4.5.2  Data modeling & Data Applications

The application, flexible query, and data analysis built on the big data platform support business development.

Construction provides a **unified big data service** , summarizes the model construction methodology applicable to the characteristics of banking business, and provides a solid data foundation for **data analysis, data mining and other data services** .

<!-- image -->

According to different functional divisions, realize unified storage and partition organization of various models, conduct research and analysis on core trading systems, and plan data analysis applications for

● **Deposits, Loans**

● **Contracts**

● **Institutions**

● **Customers**

● **Transaction details**

● **Reporting systems**

service support.

<!-- image -->

Centralized data processing is carried out through the data warehouse, strong relevant information is filtered out, basic tags and application customization are carried out by using the tagging system, and target customer selection or in-depth analysis of users is carried out according to the needs of business scenarios. Improve the design of data scenarios, improve the accuracy of target customers, conduct marketing to customers, and give feedback on marketing effects to measure the commercial value of data products.

Through the data collection and label construction of online channels such as mobile banking APP and online banking (including customer **activity data, search, browsing, purchase, payment, activity participation** , etc.), a deeper and more comprehensive understanding of customer needs can be achieved.

#### 4.5.3  Data Platform infrastructures

<!-- image -->

**Batch computing and intelligent data analysis**

Use Hadoop, Hive, Spark and other technologies to realize massive offline data computing, and provide T+1 data support for business;

**Real-time computing accelerates business decisions**

Integrate the modern data technology stack, use Flink, Kafka and other stream processing tools to complete the ingestion and calculation of real-time data, and provide more accurate data results for business in scenarios such as risk control and credit granting;

**Data-lake and Warehouse integration**

Breaking the split system between the data lake and the data warehouse, the architecture integrates the flexibility and ecological richness of the data lake with the enterprise-level capabilities of the data warehouse, and builds a data management platform that integrates the data lake and the data warehouse.

An enterprise-level high-performance data warehouse that meets the needs of high business elasticity and agility at a lower cost through cloud-native big data services.

Elastic computing & Cloud-Native

By integrating with cloud-native capabilities, computing resources can be easily scaled up and down to cope with frequently changing business traffic and refined control of server costs.

### 4.6  Cloud & Hybird

Ownbank IAAS layer is based on a hybrid architecture which takes advantage of both public cloud and private cloud.The key benefits of hybrid cloud are listed below:

●      Public cloud can provide flexible elasticity for servers,databases,message queues and other infrastructure services.

●      Private cloud can protect users' privacy by an on-premises data center. Security and governance can be followed based on local data storage policies and laws.

●  	An adequate network connection between private and public cloud environments.

**5.6 disaster recover plan of tdsql**

**Distributed High Availability**

A distributed architecture itself boasts a very high availability, that is, any failure of a single node does not affect

the overall availability of the cluster. On this basis, TDSQL further configures master-slave redundancy for each

shard to ensure constant high availability for your business.

**Automatic Node Failure Recovery**

When a physical node carrying shards fails, the scheduling system will automatically retry to recover the node.

If the original node cannot be recovered, it will automatically apply for new resources within 30 minutes,

rebuild the node from backups, and automatically add the node to the cluster to ensure long term functionality

of the master-slave switchover of the shards.

**Finance-grade Disaster Recovery**

TDSQL can provide a 1-region-2-DC or 2-region-3-DC deployment architecture. When a failure occurs,

the database can be restored to its normal condition in a matter of minutes.

# Corporate Account-App

# OwnBank Corporate Account

The Corporate Account is a bank account designed specifically for businesses in the Philippines. Companies can use the Corporate Account to manage their financial assets. 

Normally, a corporate account is used for one of the following purposes:

Banking services: Companies can use the Corporate Account for everyday banking operations such as depositing, withdrawing, and transferring funds.

Corporate services: Companies can use the Corporate Account to manage day-to-day business operations such as making supplier payments, and processing employee payroll. 

 Fund segregation: A corporate account separates a company's funds and assets from its owners. This means that the company is responsible for the funds, not just the individual owner.

# Application Process for Corporate Account

- Corporate users enter the official website
- Click apply for Corporate Account
- Submit corporate account application data
- OwnBank recieves the application information from corporate users and forwards it to the risk assessment department for review
- After the risk assessment approval is completed, a SMS notification will be sent to the corporate user to notify the application result
- After the application is successful, the account number and password will be sent to the user

# OwnBank Payroll

# Introduction to Payroll Service 

Bank Payroll Service feature refers to the service that allows employers to directly disburse their employees' salary, wage, or compensation into the employees' personal bank accounts through bank outsourcing. 

This method replaces traditional cash or check payments and offers a method of salary disbursement with heightened security, convenience, and efficiency.

# Corporate Payroll Service Process

1. Payroll Data Preparation: The company's HR or Finance Department is responsible for collecting and processing employees' payroll data. This includes information such as employees' basic wages, overtime hours, leave records, pre-tax deductions, etc.
2. Salary Calculation: Based on the employees' work circumstances and contractual agreements, the company calculates the payable salary for each employee. Payroll calculation takes into account factors such as overtime pay, performance bonus, tax deduction, etc.
3. Tax Processing: In the Philippines, employee salary is generally subject to tax withholding. Companies must calculate and withhold income tax and other relevant taxes from each employee's salary in accordance with the Philippines tax regulations.
4. Payroll Review: After payroll calculation, typically, a relevant department or personnel in charge will conduct a review of the payroll data to ensure accuracy and compliance.
5. Salary Disbursement: After completing payroll calculation and review, the company transfers each employee’s salary payment to their respective bank account or disburses salary through other payment methods, such as check or prepaid card.

# Flow of Funds

1. Corporate Account Opening: Complete the process of opening a corporate account in OwnBank.
2. Corporate Account Deposit: Make a deposit to corporate account via online banking.
3. Payroll Preparation on Payday: The accounting department prepares the payroll list and logs in to OwnBank's online banking.
4. Import the Payroll List: Import the payroll list into the online banking system and complete the application for payroll service.
5. Review by Supervisor: The supervisor of Finance Department reviews the application.
6. Employee Receives Salary: OwnBank begins the salary disbursement based on the payroll list, and each employee’s salary arrives in their respective account.

# OwnBank Payroll

# 代发薪资介绍 Introduction to Payroll Service 

银行代发薪资功能是指雇主将员工的薪资、工资或报酬等款项直接通过银行代为发放到员工个人银行账户的一种服务。这种方式取代了传统的现金支付或支票支付方式，提供了更安全、便捷和高效的薪资发放方式。 Bank Payroll Service feature refers to the service that allows employers to directly disburse their employees' salary, wage, or compensation into the employees' personal bank accounts through bank outsourcing. 

This method replaces traditional cash or check payments and offers a method of salary disbursement with heightened security, convenience, and efficiency.

# 企业代发薪资业务流程

1. 准备薪资数据：企业的人力资源部门或财务部门负责收集和处理员工的薪资数据。这包括员工的基本工资、加班工时、请假情况、税前扣除项等信息。
2. 计算薪资：根据员工的工作情况和合同约定，计算每位员工的应发工资。薪资计算要考虑加班工资、绩效奖金、税务扣除等因素。
3. 税务处理：在菲律宾，员工的薪资通常需要进行预扣税。企业必须根据菲律宾税务法规，计算并扣除每位员工的所得税和其他相关税费。
4. 薪资审核：薪资计算完成后，通常会由相关部门或负责人员对薪资数据进行审核，确保准确性和合规性。
5. 薪资发放：完成薪资计算和审核后，企业将员工的工资款项转入员工指定的银行账户，或通过其他支付方式发放工资，比如支票或预付卡。

3. Tax Processing: In the Philippines, employee salary is generally subject to tax withholding. Companies must calculate and withhold income tax and other relevant taxes from each employee's salary in accordance with the Philippines tax regulations.
4. Payroll Review: After payroll calculation, typically, a relevant department or personnel in charge will conduct a review of the payroll data to ensure accuracy and compliance.
5. Salary Disbursement: After completing payroll calculation and review, the company transfers each employee’s salary payment to their respective bank account or disburses salary through other payment methods, such as check or prepaid card.

content:
# 菲律宾现金贷市场调研

# 宏观与金融科技环境

<!-- image -->

菲律宾实际GDP增长趋势：2020-2024年回顾

菲律宾经济在2020年因新冠疫情而大幅萎缩，实际GDP下降了-9.50% 。然而，在2021年（5.7% ）和2022年（7.6% ）实现了强劲反弹。2023年增长放缓至5.5% ，2024年全年实际GDP增长达到5.6% ，略低于政府设定的6.0-6.5%目标区间 。  

下表总结了菲律宾2020-2024年的实际GDP增长数据及GDP总量：

数据来源：https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Economy\_of\_the\_Philippines

# 宏观与金融科技环境

菲律宾实际GDP增长预测：2025-2030年展望

国际货币基金组织（IMF）预测菲律宾2025年实际GDP增长率为5.5% 。亚洲开发银行（ADB）则更为乐观，预测2025年增长6.0%，2026年增长6.1% 。菲律宾政府的预测更为积极，目标是2025年实现6.5-7.5%的增长，并在2026年至2028年维持6.5-8.0%的增长 。中期来看，潜在产出预计在6.0%至6.3%之间 。  

未来增长的主要驱动力预计将是持续强劲的国内需求，这得益于通胀缓解和货币政策宽松 。公共投资的持续也将提供支撑，尽管财政整顿仍在进行 。政府致力于投资人力和物质资本，以促进包容性增长 。  

数据来源：https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Economy\_of\_the\_Philippines

<!-- image -->

# 菲律宾银行贷款余额

<!-- image -->

2025 年预期增长：

- Fitch Solutions 预测贷款余额增长将从 2024 年的 2.5% 回升至 约 7.0% 年增率，此增幅主要受益于经济回暖与信贷需求恢复 qa.philstar.com+14fitchsolutions.com+14philstar.com+14bworldonline.com+1reddit.com+1。 
- 菲国银行业亦表态预期资产与贷款将保持“十几％”的增长，尤其数字与小贷银行预计增长可达 20%+ 。 
- Fitch 与 Philstar 预计 2025 年银行贷款增长将在 10–13% 区间business.inquirer.net+4philstar.com+4philstar.com+4。 
- Fitch 预计菲律宾 GDP 增速将在 2026 年达到 6–6.2%，在这种宏观环境下，贷款增长也有望维持在双位数，但未有公开具体增速预测；我们可保守估计 9–12%。

2026 年展望：

# 菲律宾个人贷款的数据

<!-- image -->

数据来源与说明

- 2019–2021 年：根据 BSP 发布的《金融包容性概况》（Financial Inclusion Dashboard）数据，消费贷款占总贷款的约 11%，其中个人贷款约占 1/5。 
- 2022–2023 年：根据 BSP 发布的《菲律宾金融包容性快报》（Financial Inclusion Dashboard）数据，个人贷款余额分别为 1,280 亿₱（2022 年）和 1,610 亿₱（2023 年）。

# 菲律宾中个人贷款用途类别

消费用途：购买家电、手机、旅游、汽车配件、小型家居改善 教育用途：支付学费、培训费、在线课程 医疗用途：住院费、手术费、长期治疗费用 创业用途：购买原材料、租赁店面、日常运营资金 住房装修：小额贷款用于粉刷墙壁、换地板等 债务整合：合并信用卡和其他贷款，降低月还款压力 

<!-- image -->

# 菲律宾前五大银行贷款余额

<!-- image -->

# 菲律宾数字银行&钱包贷款业务情况

<!-- image -->

# 菲律宾app调研报告

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rWeQms\_TKPJ1YSC\_cw3Nz4Zdujw7o1\_xE5aslOv7M9c/edit?gid=0#gid=0

# 现金贷产品形态

📌 一、借款额度与期限

- 贷款额度： 
- 最低额度：如 PHP 1,000
- 最高额度：如 PHP 200,000（首贷额度可调低）
- 竞品差异化：
1. 1.一次进件，同时获得现金贷款额度和信用卡额度
2. 2.还款日与信用卡保持一致
3. 3.账单合并
4. 4.支持循环借款
- 好处：
5. 1.用户无需多次进件，急用钱时可以立刻获得资金
6. 2.用户不需记录多个还款日
7. 3.有一个汇总欠款额，还款方便
8. 4.共享开发运营人员，共享营销活动费用，同时节约人力和成本 
- 借款期限： 
- 超短期：如 7/14 天（竞品分析中当前最短期限是15天）
- 短期：如 30天~90天
- 中期：3/6/12个月

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

# 现金贷产品形态

📌 二、利率与费用结构

- 利率类型：日利率/周利率/月利率/年化利率（APR） 月利率 15%  实际年化利率180%
- 服务费/平台费： （砍头息）贷款本金5%或300比索，两者取更高者 
- 逾期罚息： 
- Late payment fees include 1% of the unpaid installment plus 0.15% of the outstanding balance per day 
- 是否支持提前还款：只支持当期的提前还款，但利息不减免

# 现金贷产品形态

📌 三、用户准入与审核机制

- KYC机制： 
- 基本信息（姓名、手机号、身份证等）
- 面部识别验证（Liveness Check）
- App行为/设备信息/联系人数据
- 其他：地址证明、收入证明（可选）
- 信用评估： 
- 外部数据源（如 CIC/TransUnion/CreditInfo）

Product Description

Loan amount：500PHP-300000PHP

For now support app，but in the future maybe website and etc.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rWeQms\_TKPJ1YSC\_cw3Nz4Zdujw7o1\_xE5aslOv7M9c/edit?gid=0#gid=0

# Product Description

1.KYC Credit Approval Process:

The user submits a cash loan application. Upon approval, a credit limit is granted. Note that this credit approval process will be linked with the credit card limit, allowing the user to obtain two credit limits through a single application—one for the cash loan and one for the credit card. Typically, the cash loan limit equals the credit card limit plus an additional credit line.

2.Withdrawal Process:

The user can withdraw funds at any time within the approved credit limit. The withdrawn amount will be instantly credited to the Own Wallet account, anytime and anywhere.

3. Repayment Process:

After the withdrawal process, the user is required to make timely repayments according to the repayment schedule specified by the bank. Early repayment is also supported; however, the user is still required to pay interest as outlined in the repayment plan.Various repayment methods are supported, including equal principal payments, equal installment payments (principal and interest), and flexible repayment (borrow and repay anytime).

4. Post-Loan Management:

If the user fails to make repayments on time, the loan will be considered overdue. In such cases, penalty interest will be charged.

# Key product features 

- End-to-end process flow (from application to repayment)
- Involved teams and handoffs 
- Required technology integration and testing

Integrated with CIC, 64AI, and Trust Social.

5. request setting Membership Fee Name, Actual Membership Fee, Marked Membership Fee, and Active Status, if active status is enable it will be in effect when submit, if active status is deactivate, it will not be in effect when submit.

The fee calculation methods contains flat, by percentage and flat+percentage, the Threshold Type  contains per transaction(amount ) and per month(amount ) , there will be different fee methods above or below threshold amount. The tranction fee will be flat below threshold amount , and will be different up to setup above threshold amount .

- The chart records the newest setup of the transaction fee , can view historical setup or edit new setup .
- Flat means there will be a flat fee despite how much transaction amount

Percentage means the fee will be a percent of transaction amount

Flat +Percentage means the fee will be a flat fee add a percent of transaction amount

Own Wish Introductory page-1

- Own Wish is a target financial product where the user selects the wish and calculates the user's target financial amount based on their actual deposit capacity and expected deposit period
- Own Wish is essentially a time deposit that requires users to save compulsorily, and if it is abandoned halfway through the calculation of earnings will be calculated based on the call rate
- Target user group: Users who often set goals but always stop halfway
- Users click the [Don't want to give up?] button, go to the next page

Own Wish Introductory page-2

- With Own Wish, fulfill your wishes and get Wish Tracker bonus!
- What is Wish Tracker
1. To allow for better user participation, we intend to set a margin money,users complete each investment period on time,margin money can be returned.If you do not deposit in time, the margin money will be deducted.The deducted amount will be divided among the finishers
2. This margin money we call Wish Tracker
- Next Wish Tracker Bonus Share, the amount shown here is how many people are currently participating in Wish Tracker, and how much Wish Tracker Bonus is accumulated now, and you can divide this money when you finish this month

# Own Bank Card Issuance & Services 

# OwnBank Card Product Introduction

- OwnBank will verify user’s identity.
- If the user's KYC meets the requirements, OwnBank will provide the user with a virtual account which needs to be activated by the user before usage.
- The Mastercard-based virtual account allows its users to conveniently make payments for transactions such as online shopping, booking, and subscription on local and international e-commerce websites such as Amazon, Lazada, and Shopee.
- To apply for a physical card, the user needs to pay a certain card issuance fee or apply for free if the user meets certain promotional requirements.
- The physical card also supports ATM withdraw and transfer at within Mastercard or BancNet networks.
- The bank will determine and approve the credit limit based on the user's KYC information

OwnBank Debit/Credit Card is a card product of OwnBank, a result of collaboration with Mastercard to provide users with virtual account and payment services powered by  Mastercard.  Users can apply for a physical debit or credit card from OwnBank according to their own needs. Once an application is approved by OwnBank, the card could either be mailed to the mailing address provided by the user or collected at an OwnBank branch.

<!-- image -->

# Introduction to Types of OwnBank Card 

Debit Card  (Physical Card / Virtual Card)

- When there are available funds in OwnBasic Account (SA/CA), they can be withdrawn or used to pay for shopping expenses.
- When there are no available funds in OwnBasic Account, the credit limit can be used to withdraw cash or pay for shopping expenses.
- OwnBank "Debit and Credit All-in-One Card" Mastercard is a single card that combines the features of debit and credit cards, prioritizing the use of OwnBank's credit limit (Credit Account) for cash withdrawals or shopping expenses. When the limit is insufficient, the available funds in the account can be used for payments. The balance in OwnBasic Account can be used for cash withdrawals, fund transfers, and other transactions.

Credit Card   (Physical Card / Virtual Card)

"Debit and Credit All-in-One Card"  (Physical Card / Virtual Card)

# OwnBank Debit Card

1. User has an OwnBank account. OwnBank will assign a virtual debit card to the user by default.
2. User activates the card prior to its normal usage.

Debit Card Features:

Card issuance requirements:

1. Deposit and withdrawal.
2. The balance is linked to OwnBasic Account.
3. Supports online/offline POS spending.

# Introduction to OwnBank Card Upgrade Process

1. After activating the default virtual debit card, user could upgrade to a virtual credit card or a virtual all-in-one card by providing additional KYC information.
2. Users with virtual debit card and virtual credit /virtual all-in-one card can apply for physical card.
3. The virtual debit card of a user who applies for a physical card can remain in use with no need for replacement after the user completes the information for an upgrade to a credit or all-in-one card.

<!-- image -->

# KYC Process for Debit Card Upgrade to Credit/All-in-One Card

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

Tips: After a successful upgrade, a credit account which automatically links its user’s all-in-one / credit card will be opened.

# Appendix: Process for Basic Account Upgrade to Full Account

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

Tips: When a user with a Basic Account clicks the “Upgrade” button for a debit card upgrade to credit/all-in-one card, the user needs an upgrade to Full Account before resuming the card upgrade process.

# Differences between OwnBank's All-in-One card and Debit/Credit Card

All-In-One Card: 

1. The credit limit will be used first for spending. 
2. User deposit and interbank transfer-in will go into OwnBasic Account. 
3. At an ATM cash withdrawal, the fund will first be withdrawn from OwnBasic Account. If the withdrawal amount exceeds the balance in the OwnBasic Account, the insufficient amount will be withdrawn from the credit limit. 
4. Due date repayment will be automatically debited from the user’s OwnBasic Account. The user also has the option of manual repayment.

# Billing and Repayment for Credit/All-in-One Card

1. Each billing statement is generated based on the summarization at a set date each month of the payments made in a set period.
2. Two bill repayment methods are supported: minimum payment and full payment.
3. Billing cycle: calculated from one day after a billing date to the next billing date.
4. Billing amount：
5. The repayment date settings: the period between the time the bill is generated and the next billing date.
6. Minimum repayment amount: 

   Total amount of the current bill = total spend in the current bill + outstanding balance from the previous bill + penalty + interest.

                     

Outstanding amount from the previous bill = previous bill amount - the amount paid during the current billing cycle.

The minimum payment is the minimum repayment amount needed in a billing period to change its billing status to "paid".

        

Minimum payment = a certain percentage of the outstanding balance within the credit limit on the current billing statement + outstanding balance from previous bill + late fee + interest.

# Formula for interest and penalty calculations

Interest and Penalty Calculations 

1. Interest Calculation: 

If a credit card is repaid within the interest-free period, no interest will be charged. After the due date, interest will be calculated on a daily basis at a certain interest rate per spending in the current month as the principal, from the day of spending until the entire balance is paid.

Interest per transaction = Single transaction amount × number of days × interest rate.

The total transaction interest = Sum of the interest on all single transactions.

2. Penalty Collection Requirements：

If the amount paid before the due date (included) is greater than or equal to the minimum payment amount, it will not be considered as overdue. If the payment amount is less than the minimum payment amount, a penalty will be charged.

3. The accrued interest and penalty will be included in the next bill.

# Card Risk Control

1. The card cannot be transferred or lent to others for use.
2. The cardholder can decide to suspend, report loss, or cancel the card and its rights at any time and for any reason.
3. The cardholder's account can only be closed after all fees and outstanding debts incurred by the card usage are fully paid.
4. The balance of the cardholder's OwnBasic Account should be used to settle all fees and outstanding debts incurred by the card usage, and the cardholder should compensate the bank for all fees (including legal fees) and expenses incurred by the bank in recovering these funds.
5. The bank may freeze or terminate the card account and its rights, as well as all supplementary cards, without prior notice to the cardholder, in the event of, including but not limited to, arrears, default, false statement, fraudulent use, and other similar conditions. In this case, the cardholder shall immediately fully settle the outstanding debts. Only after the cardholder's debts are fully paid, the cardholder's card account can be deemed closed. In the event of cardholder card account termination, the bank will not refund any portion of the membership fee or any portion thereof to the cardholder.
6. If the card is lost or stolen, the cardholder should immediately report the loss to the bank to block the card. If the card is used for fraudulent purposes, the lost card protection feature can relieve the cardholder of any financial liability, but only from the time of loss report to the bank.
7. The cardholder can apply to the bank for a lost card replacement. After reissuing, the bank will send the card to the address provided by the user. The user can also opt for pick up at a bank branch.

# Customer Service & Complaint

Help & Support

Users can resolve encountered issues through the following methods.

1. View issues and solutions on App-My-Help and Support.

2. View issues and solutions on OwnBank Official Website - Help and Support.

or call customer service directly at:

      +63 (02) 7793 0999 (Metro Manila)

      +63 (046) 431 2066

or contact us via email: cs@ownbank.com.ph

Bank address：505 P. Burgos Ave, Caridad, Cavite City, Cavite 4100, Philippines

# OwnBank Card Platform

OwnBank has built a complete credit card backend service, including credit card product creation, credit card limit application, risk control review, card transactions and other business functions.

You can modify the fields of the card product such as the rate, default payment date, etc.

Channeling

(Technical Process)

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

The Concept of “Channeling” (Channeled Financing)

- Bank lends money to the debtor through Multifinance Company or other financial institutions.
- Small amount loans for the bank so the process is represented by MF Company.
- More efficient for the bank to increase number of accounts and loan oustanding.
- Without directly maintain all the small loans.

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

Channeling Process

Enrollment & Disbursement

Flow Summary:

<!-- image -->

Step 1 (Enrollment)

- User apply loan to Akulaku to buy goods from merchant >> Loan approved by Akulaku >> User pay down payment >> Merchant send goods to user >> Loan officially created >> User become Akulaku debtor.

Step 2 (Disbursement)

- Akulaku channel user’s debt to bank >> Bank approved >> User’s debt to Akulaku switched to bank >> User become bank’s debtor >> Bank disburse the fund to AL based on the user loan amount >> AL use the fund to pay the merchant.

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

Channeling Process

Enrollment & Disbursement

Flow Summary:

<!-- image -->

Step 3 (Accounting)

- User loan removed from AL “on” balance sheet >> Switched to AL “off” balance sheet >> User loan become bank “on” balance sheet.

Step 4 (Additional Information)

- If the bank reject the channeled loan >> Loan still belong to AL >> AL pay merchant using its own money.
- Bank disburse the fund to AL via disbursement escrow account >> AL take the fund from the escrow account to AL own account.
- Channeled users are not sent one by one but accumulated from many user’s loan in 1 file.

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

Channeling Process

Enrollment Data Transfer

Akulaku User’s Data Transfer Option:

Manual

- Sending user’s data in bulk file (xls, csv etc) through safe file transfer protocol (SFTP) with any recommended choice.
- Bank check the data again, they can reject/approve based on their T&C and preference.
- For the first time cooperation, only this option available.

<!-- image -->

API

- Sending user’s data automatically when user’s loan approved and created.
- Bank did not have to check the terms and condition of the loan since it’s previously agreed.
- After the channeling process has been running smoothly for some time, this option available.

Channeling Process

Enrollment Data

Template

Akulaku User’s Data Availability

can be adjusted to match with the bank

core banking system

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

CHANNELING /

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

Channeling Process

Repayment & Buyback

<!-- image -->

Repayment Concept

- User repay their loan to AL via AL payment option >> AL received user’s payment >> AL transfer user’s payment fund to bank’s repayment escrow account >> Bank deduct the fund to process the user’s payment.

Repayment Type (User’s Payment Status)

AL will pay to bank based on what user’s pay to AL:

- Regular Payment =  Paying 1 active installment and due payment (if any).
- Overdue = Did not pay.
- Settled / Early Termination = Paying all the installment left so the loan are settled afterward.

Buyback Option

- If one loan reach 90 days past due (DPD), AL will buyback the loan.
- AL pay off the DPD loan same type with Early Termination.
- The buyback loan back to AL “on” balance sheet.

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

Channeling Process

Repayment & Buyback

<!-- image -->

Repayment Technical Flow

- Bank send payment invoice to AL that contain all user’s credit data (OS, payment amount, principal & interest portion) >> AL checking the user’s payment status and send the updated invoice back >> AL send the payment fund to bank based on the invoice + user’s payment status.

Additional Information

- User payment to AL via AL payment option >> AL payment to bank via escrow account.
- User’s payment maturity date following their schedule in AL >> AL to Bank payment maturity date following disbursement date.
- There will be few days gap between User’s payment to AL with AL payment to bank.
- AL keep user’s payment fund first until paying to bank on maturity date.
- The amount user pay to AL are bigger from what AL paid to bank (different interest rate) >> The margin is AL income.

Repayment Schedule & Interest Margin Sample

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

Repayment Type Sample

## 简易开户 Simple Account Opening

### 功能介绍 Introduction to Feature：

简易账户开通是方便用户通过最少的资料的完成开户，获得ownbank基础账户，体验ownbank的服务

Simple account opening allows users to provide the least information in completing the account opening process and getting an OwnBank basic account to experience the services of OwnBank

### 功能页面描述 Page Description of the Feature：

**1.简易账户开户流程 The process of simple account opening**

#### 1.1输入姓 Enter the name

<!-- image -->

#### 1.2输入出生日、出生地信息 Enter the date and place of birth

<!-- image -->

**1.3输入地址信息 Enter the address**

<!-- image -->

**1.4验证人脸 Face recognition**

<!-- image -->

1.5设置PIN码 Set up a PIN

l  密码设置成功，简易户开通成功 PIN setup successful and simple account opening successful

<!-- image -->

### 2.简易账户交易限制 Simple account opening restricted transactions：

| 交易类型  Transaction Type                      | 限制描述 Description                        |
|---------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| cash in                                     | 可以充值，账户内最高余额PHP50k Available, max. ₱50k |
| cash out                                    | 不可使用 Not available                      |
| send cash                                   | 不可使用 Not available                      |
| 同行transfer Transfer to another OwnBank user | 可以使用 Available                          |
| 跨行transfer Interbank transfer               | 不可使用 Not available                      |
| 购买理财 Investment product purchase            | 可以使用 Available                          |
| 购买会员 Membership purchase                    | 可以使用 Available                          |
| 购买生活服务类产品 Load & Bills payment              | 可以使用 Available                          |
| 支付代理费 Own Banker Fee Payment                | 可以使用 Available                          |

**Home PAGE**

**(not registered or logged in)**

<!-- image -->

- OwnBanker is an officially authorized micro-entrepreneur, become our OwnBanker and earn income by developing our business
- How Ownbanker get revenue share?
Answer:You can develop agents to gain profits, can also develop new users to gain profits. Agents can continue to help us promote various businesses and earn revenue from them. 
A.You develop a NewOwnbanker or user and directly you get a share.
B.The NewOwnbanker you develop also develops a new Ownbanker, you can get an indirect share
- How to become our agent
Answer:You need to open an OwnBank-account,and then you need to pay an agency fee
- Hierarchy of Ownbanker?
Answer: Agents are divided into three levels,your rank will be upgraded according to the business you develop.Now divided into OwnBanker Silver、OwnBanker Gold、OwnBanker Platinum
- The red box on the right is the entrance to OwnBanker

| Description   | Photo   |
|---------------|---------|

<!-- image -->

OwnBanker introduction page

**(Registered or logged in)**

- This is OwnBanker's recruitment introduction page
- It is divided into the following modules
1. Three features of OwnBanker：Low Cost, Revenue Sharing, Win-Win
2. Become an OwnBanker and grow your income earnings chart through your efforts
3. How do I get revenue share? Invite your friends to be OwnBankers, Invite friends to open their OwnBank accounts, Invite friends to buy financial products on OwnBank for the first time
4. The more you develop, the more revenue share you get! OwnBanker is divided into three levels:Silver,Gold, Platinum
5. Some cases of Star OwnBanker

- Click the button to become an Ownbanker
- You need to log in and open an account to become an Ownbanker
- This page will be displayed within the app and will also be placed in external channels

| Description   | Photo   |

- Click to send verification code

**(registered or logged in)**

- Currently supports payment of fees via account balance
1. If the current balance is insufficient, the user will be prompted to top up

2. Show the user's current balance, historical total revenue
3. Expanding your business, OwnBanker promotes according to their actual business needs. Current promotions include: New OwnBanker,New User,New Investor.Click on different businesses to display different business posters. OwnBanker can promote through different posters

content:
## Send Cash

### 

**Introduction of Feature：**

Send Cash的应用场景主要是给无银行账户或者电子钱包账户的人群进行现金汇款

The function of Send Cash is to provide cash remittance service for people without bank accounts or e-wallet accounts

功能页面描述：

Page description:

#### 1.首页入口Entry to Send Cash Page

<!-- image -->

- 点击send cash进入send cash页

Click Send Cash to enter Send Cash page

#### 1 1Send Cash页 Send Cash Page

<!-- image -->

Click “Select a receiving outlet” to enter the receiving outlet selection page. After selecting a receiving outlet, return to this page

- 输入收款人的first name、middle name、last name、手机号

Enter recipient information, such as first name, middle name, last name, and mobile number

- 输入汇款金额，点击下一步进入Send cash确认页

Enter the remittance amount, and click Next to enter Remittance Confirmation Page

### Receiving Outlet Selection Process

<!-- image -->

- 输入收款人地址，通过google map匹配地址

Enter recipient address and match the addresses via Google Maps

- 根据收款人地址，查询出收款人附近的取款门店

Search nearby receiving outlet based on recipient address

- 选择取款门店，返回到Send Cash页

Select the receiving outlet, and return to Send Cash page

### Remittance Confirmation Page

<!-- image -->

- 点击确认，校验交易密码

Click Confirm and enter your PIN for verification

### Pending Pickup Result Page

<!-- image -->

- 交易密码验证通过，进入该页面，获取取款码，通知对方进行取款

After the PIN is verified, you will enter this page, get Reference No. (Ref No), then Notify Recipient to pick up the money.

### 1 View Map

<!-- image -->

Click on the map entry to view the information on receiving outlets near recipient address

## Cash Out

### 

**Introduction of Feature:**

Cash Out的应用场景主要是用户想要支取ownbank账户内的资金，通过线下门店获取现金

The function of Cash Out is to provide users with Own Bank account fund withdrawal service through physical offline stores

### Page Description:

#### 1.首页入口 Entry to Cash Out Page

<!-- image -->

- 点击cash out 入口，进入cash out页面

Click Cash Out to enter Cash Out page

#### 2.1Cash Out页 Cash Out Page

<!-- image -->

- 基于用户定位信息，查找出用户附近的取款门店

Based on user location information, search the Cash Out Outlets nearby

- 用户未开启定位时，也可以选择平台支持的取款门店进行取款，选择门店，进入下一页

# Own It

# Homepage

<!-- image -->

- OwnIt is a wealth management product with higher returns than Saving accounts. It is characterized by easy operation, low threshold, zero handling fee, and can be withdrewl at any time.
- On Wealth Page added entrance for OwnIt
- Clicking “Deposit Now” Button will bring user to “Own It introduction page”

# Own It introduction page

<!-- image -->

- Users who have not invested in Own It will be shown the product introduction page of Own It.
- This page showcases some highlights of Own It.
- Clicking the 【Deposit Now】 button will take you to the investment page of Own It.
- Users need to complete a sample account before they can invest in Own It.

# Own It Asset Page 

<!-- image -->

- If the user has invested in Own It and enters the Wealth page, the current Own It asset information will be displayed.
- This page displays the current Own It balance, current investment rate, cumulative interest earnings, and yesterday's interest earnings.
- Clicking on the button in the upper right corner will take you to the History page.
- Clicking on "Deposit" will take you to the Own It investment page.
- Clicking on "Withdraw" will take you to the Own It withdrawal page.

# History Page

<!-- image -->

- This page will display all transaction records for Own It, including deposits, withdrawals, interest, payments, and more.

# Own It Deposit page

<!-- image -->

- The user fills in the investment amount.
- Every day, Own It generates interest. Clicking on the "Deposit Now" button will take you to the Own Pay page, where you can select a payment method to make the payment.
- The interest generated by Own It is subject to interest tax.

# Own It Withdraw page

<!-- image -->

- The user initiates a withdrawal operation upon entering this page.
- The user fills in the withdrawal amount based on their actual situation and selects a withdrawal method.
- Withdrawal method - Instant withdrawal: Upon successful withdrawal, funds will be instantly transferred from Own It to the Own Basic Account.
- Withdrawal method - Regular withdrawal: Upon successful withdrawal, funds will be transferred from Own It to the Own Basic Account. The processing time for the withdrawal is T+1, where T refers to business days.
- Currently, Instant withdrawal has a limit. The maximum amount supported for Instant withdrawal is 50,000 pesos per day.

# Exo Api Discuss

Solution 1: API Integration

Question：

1. Would this solution handle a large amount of data without any issues?
2. If issues arise later, shifting from initially troubleshooting problems related to CSV uploads to troubleshooting problems related to API may require additional development resources to address the issues.
3. Now facing many issues with upload and import failures.

MBPhi\_ response：As per carlos there will be no issues when handling large volume of data.

Solution 2: Continue uploading CSV files.

Question：

①The time in the CSV file data is not consistent with the current time in the EXO system, causing issues with the imported data's timestamp.

②If a large amount of data is uploaded at once, the server may crash, resulting in partial success and partial failure of the data upload. This leads to the generation of duplicated data from repeated uploads.

# Exo Api Discuss

As the final solution is to replace EXO with New Icore, Mary also suggests considering the possibility of hiring an EXO employee. They would be familiar with the system, especially the reporting module, and could provide valuable insights into our replacement system.

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

<!-- image -->

The offline branch business can be broadly categorized into: 

1. Account opening

2. Deposits and withdrawals

3. Transfers

4. Passbook services

5. Loans

6. Paying bills.

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

①Account openning

1. 如果线下用户过来开户，我们优先引导用户下载own bank app. 自己完成开户操作。我们可以在网点粘贴二维码或者有专门的人指引用户完成app下载并协助用户完成开户

If offline users come in for account opening, we prioritize guiding them to download our own bank app and complete the account opening process themselves.We can either display QR codes at the branch for users to scan or assign dedicated staff to guide users through the app download process and assist them in completing the account opening.

2. 如果用户没有智能手机或电子设置，我们可以提供机器（比如专用手机或者ipad），让用户在机器上完成开户操作。

If users do not have a smartphone or electronic device, we can provide machines (such as dedicated phones or iPads) for users to complete the account opening process on-site.

3. 如果用户在网点完成开户，网点的同事可以建群直接让风控kyc审核优先审核。用户可以当场比较短的时间完成开户操作

If a user completes the account opening process at the branch, colleagues at the branch can create a group to facilitate priority KYC review by the risk control team. This enables users to complete the account opening process in a relatively short amount of time on the spot.

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

②Deposits 、withdrawals and Transfers

方案一：用户完成开户后，在网点提供的机具上完成cash in或者cash out的操作。生成订单，获得ref no.然后去附近的合作网点完成存款或者取款。

Option 1: After users complete the account opening, they can use the provided terminals at the branch to perform cash-in or cash-out transactions. This generates an order, obtains a Ref No, and then the user can go to a nearby partnered branch to complete the deposit or withdrawal.

方案二：我们仍需搭建现金管理系统，用户存取款通过系统完成操作。

Option 2: We still need to establish a cash management system, and users can perform deposit and withdrawal transactions through the system.

问题：但当前一个月仍然有10个用户使用支票存款，sherryll建议还是保留存折存款的功能。

Question: However, there are still 10 users using check deposits this month. Sherryll suggests retaining the option for passbook deposits.

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

③Passbook services

1. 原先passbook可以让用户随时看到自己当前账户的余额及交易记录，后续我们计划所有的用户线上化。不发行存折了。

Initially, the passbook allowed users to view their current account balance and transaction history at any time. However, in the future, we plan to transition all users to online services and discontinue the issuance of passbooks.

2. 用户想要查询交易流水或余额时，我们提供终端设备供用户登录查询。如果用户需要纸质版的交易流水，我们也提供打印服务。

When users wish to check their transaction history or account balance, we provide terminals for them to log in and access the information. If users prefer a physical copy of their transaction history, we offer a printing service.

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

④Loan

1. 贷款申请:当前app还不支持贷款功能，因此贷款功能需要新建纸件系统。用户线下填写资料，线下完成kyc审核并发放。Icore系统录入用户贷款借据数据

Loan Application: The current app does not yet support loan functionality, so  new icore system is required for loan processing. Users will fill out information offline, complete KYC verification offline, and receive disbursement offline. The Icore system will input user loan promissory note data.

2.还款申请：用户发起线下还款时，可以选择余额还款或者现金还款。同样完成还款操作后，记录在icore系统。

Repayment Request: When users initiate offline repayments, they can choose either balance repayment or cash repayment. After completing the repayment process, the transaction details will be recorded in the Icore system.

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

④Pay Bills

当前exo系统是否没有pay bills的模块，用户有pay bills的需求，可以优先引导用户在机器上面缴纳。

The current Exo system lacks a module for paying bills. If users have the need to pay bills, they can be prioritized and guided to make payments on the machine.

⑤Qustions

是否还有其他业务没有考虑到，后续所有的新增的线下用户和他们需要办理的业务，都按照上面我们规定进行。同时exo不会再有新增数据

Are there any other business aspects that have not been taken into consideration. All subsequent new offline users and the services they need to process will follow the regulations we specified above.At the same time, there will be no more new data added to Exo.

# Exo Swap - Migration of Old User Data

①Old User Data

1. 新系统支持使用老帐号查询，当前还存在老用户（exo用户数据），因此我们需要迁移此部分数据。

The new system supports querying using old accounts, and there are still existing old users (Exo user data). Therefore, we need to migrate this portion of the data.

2. exo老用户来现场网点，由于新icore下所有的用户都转移到App，我们会提供机器让用户录入手机号+OTP验证，生成app账号。针对原本exo的数据，我们会做合并数据处理。

Old Exo users who visit our on-site branches can use a provided machine to input their phone number and undergo OTP verification to generate an app account. For the original Exo data, we will perform data merging and processing since all users have been transferred to the new Icore system under the app.

3. 问题点：

① 活期、定期、贷款的迁移方案？

② 历史交易流水是否需要迁移？或者根据快照数据迁移即可？

Issue points:

① Migration plans for current accounts, fixed-term deposits, and loans?

② Is the migration of historical transaction records necessary, or can it be done based on snapshot data?

# Exo Swap - Migration of Old User Data

②Icore Data Upload

报表功能未开发完成时，仍需依赖exo系统中的jasper报表能力。

When the reporting function is not yet fully developed, we still need to rely on the Jasper reporting capabilities within the Exo system.

③Icore Data Upload

# Thanks

The offline branch business can be broadly categorized into:

2. Deposits and withdrawals

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

①Account openning

1. 如果线下用户过来开户，我们优先引导用户下载own bank app. 自己完成开户操作。我们可以在网点粘贴二维码或者有专门的人指引用户完成app下载并协助用户完成开户

If offline users come in for account opening, we prioritize guiding them to download our own bank app and complete the account opening process themselves.We can either display QR codes at the branch for users to scan or assign dedicated staff to guide users through the app download process and assist them in completing the account opening.

2. 如果用户没有智能手机或电子设置，我们可以提供机器（比如专用手机或者ipad），让用户在机器上完成开户操作。

If users do not have a smartphone or electronic device, we can provide machines (such as dedicated phones or iPads) for users to complete the account opening process on-site.

3. 如果用户在网点完成开户，网点的同事可以建群直接让风控kyc审核优先审核。用户可以当场比较短的时间完成开户操作

If a user completes the account opening process at the branch, colleagues at the branch can create a group to facilitate priority KYC review by the risk control team. This enables users to complete the account opening process in a relatively short amount of time on the spot.

?

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

②Deposits 、withdrawals and Transfers

方案一：用户完成开户后，在网点提供的机具上完成cash in或者cash out的操作。生成订单，获得ref no.然后去附近的合作网点完成存款或者取款。

Option 1: After users complete the account opening, they can use the provided terminals at the branch to perform cash-in or cash-out transactions. This generates an order, obtains a Ref No, and then the user can go to a nearby partnered branch to complete the deposit or withdrawal.

方案二：我们仍需搭建现金管理系统，用户存取款通过系统完成操作

Option 2: We still need to establish a cash management system, and users can perform deposit and withdrawal transactions through the system.

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

③Passbook services

1. 原先passbook可以让用户随时看到自己当前账户的余额及交易记录，后续我们计划所有的用户线上化。不发行存折了。

Initially, the passbook allowed users to view their current account balance and transaction history at any time. However, in the future, we plan to transition all users to online services and discontinue the issuance of passbooks.

2. 用户想要查询交易流水或余额时，我们提供终端设备供用户登录查询。如果用户需要纸质版的交易流水，我们也提供打印服务。

When users wish to check their transaction history or account balance, we provide terminals for them to log in and access the information. If users prefer a physical copy of their transaction history, we offer a printing service.

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

④Loan

1. 贷款申请:当前app还不支持贷款功能，因此贷款功能需要新建纸件系统。用户线下填写资料，线下完成kyc审核并发放。Icore系统录入用户贷款借据数据

Loan Application: The current app does not yet support loan functionality, so  new icore system is required for loan processing. Users will fill out information offline, complete KYC verification offline, and receive disbursement offline. The Icore system will input user loan promissory note data.

2.还款申请：用户发起线下还款时，可以选择余额还款或者现金还款。同样完成还款操作后，记录在icore系统。

Repayment Request: When users initiate offline repayments, they can choose either balance repayment or cash repayment. After completing the repayment process, the transaction details will be recorded in the Icore system.

# Exo Swap - New Icore for new user

④Pay Bills

当前exo系统是否没有pay bills的模块，用户有pay bills的需求，可以优先引导用户在机器上面缴纳。

The current Exo system lacks a module for paying bills. If users have the need to pay bills, they can be prioritized and guided to make payments on the machine.

⑤Qustions

是否还有其他业务没有考虑到，后续所有的新增的线下用户和他们需要办理的业务，都按照上面我们规定进行。同时exo不会再有新增数据

Are there any other business aspects that have not been taken into consideration. All subsequent new offline users and the services they need to process will follow the regulations we specified above.At the same time, there will be no more new data added to Exo.

# Exo Swap - Migration of Old User Data

1. 新系统支持使用老帐号查询，当前还存在老用户（exo用户数据），因此我们需要迁移此部分数据。

The new system supports querying using old accounts, and there are still existing old users (Exo user data). Therefore, we need to migrate this portion of the data.

2. exo老用户来现场网点，由于新icore下所有的用户都转移到App，我们会提供机器让用户录入手机号+OTP验证，生成app账号。针对原本exo的数据，我们会做合并数据处理。

Old Exo users who visit our on-site branches can use a provided machine to input their phone number and undergo OTP verification to generate an app account. For the original Exo data, we will perform data merging and processing since all users have been transferred to the new Icore system under the app.
